attributes.action: Bring Emmanuel Adebayor up on criminal charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This past Saturday, 12th September 2009, Premiership footballer Emmanuel Adebayor of Manchester City perpetrated an assault on former Arsenal Team-mate Robin Van Persie.

The incident, which was captured on camera and shown live around the world, has as yet yielded only FA sanctions.

If this same assault had been perpetrated by the man on the street, he'd have been arrested and would face court proceedings and possible jail time.

We, the undersigned, ask the Prime Minister to help overturn this gross miscarriage of justice and stop treating millionaires - including, but not limited to, footballers - as if they're above the law.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
